full_summary:
**Tender Title**
## Electromagnetic Interference (EMI) Test Receiver

**Federal Contract Opportunity**

Ref. Number: CB-75-9436405
Solicitation #: ISED 211633

**Public Tender Notice**
[Released on] November 15, 2024

**Submissions Deadline**: December 2, 2024 at 11:00 am AST

**Nature of Work**

The Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada invites eligible contractors to bid on the provision of an EMI Test Receiver. 

This solicitation falls under the category of electronic hardware and parts.

**Eligibility and Conditions of Participation**
The tender is open to Canadian companies and businesses under the following trade agreements: 
North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement,  Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership.

**Submission Information**

Proposal packages may be downloaded from the Canada Buy Service at
https://canadabuys.canada.ca

There are no site visits planned.

**Attachments**

Tender Notice (solicitation) in English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51889/test-receiver_solicitation_eng.pdf

Tender notice (solicitation) in French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51889/test-receiver_solicitation_fre_3.pdf

**Point of Contact**

Shelley Bailey
Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada
(343) 596-3640
shelley.bailey@ised-isde.gc.ca
